participants.name: Timo C. King
participants.title: IT Recruiter Team Lead at MATRIX Resources

messages.message:
Brian - DevOps - Work with Matrix!

Hi Brian, 

I see you are interested in new opportunities.

I have job opportunity as a DevOps Engineer with one of our clients.

Could you give me a few minutes of your time to talk about it?}

Give me a call or give me a number to call.

Regards,

Timo C. King
8117813969 | timocoleking@gmail.com
Waste of time. I've already been submitted and they never responded.

Hey Brian, so this is a new role that came out today, it might be with different managers. There are many variables that could explain why they never called you. I would like to just talk with you a few minutes to get a feel for what you are looking for as we do have many other clients out there or who knows, you might know someone that needs a job atm. We pay $500 USD referral fees for any hires. What time can I call you?
Do you know anyone that likes Nodejs? I have a contract job for them 60/hr.
